name: TooManyPixels!
description: TooManyPixels! is a multiplayer online game created by JupiterRobot that allows players to draw black pixels on a shared canvas and erase them at the same time as other players. Similar to the popular r/place, this game has no drawing cooldown, meaning that players can draw and erase as fast as they want. Although there is no real objective to this game, TMP's objective is to create intricate and collaborative artwork with other players, and even start wars regarding specific artwork in real time.  Even though it is still a prototype and not yet finished, the game promises to be an exciting and engaging experience for anyone who loves to create and collaborate in a virtual space. Get ready to let your creativity run wild!
